summary: XML omni-completion data for NAnt build files
name: NAnt-completion
description: File to allow Vim's xml autocompletion to work with NAnt build files (http://nant.sourceforge.net/). Elements and attributes were taken from the 0.85 version schema.
install_details:
Copy the nant.vim file in to ~/.vim/autoload/xml/
NAnt files should be recognized as XML files, but you'll need to call ":XMLns nant" to load this data. I have a one line nant.vim file in ~/.vim/ftplugin with the line "XMLns nant" in it.
